setFilterInfo

public final void setFilterInfo(Map filterInfo)
Description copied from interface: ListDataProvider
This method should be used to receive the current filter info.

The corresponding Expression is constructed lazily.

The same Map instance can be modified at the back-end using the method ListQuery.getFilterInfo() before the actual Expression is constructed.

Specified by:
setFilterInfo in interface ListDataProvider
Parameters:
filterInfo - the filter of the list.

setOrderInfo

public final void setOrderInfo(OrderInfo orderInfo)
Description copied from interface: ListDataProvider
This method should be used to receive the current ordering info.

The corresponding ComparatorExpression is constructed lazily.

The same OrderInfo instance can be modified at the back-end using the method ListQuery.getOrderInfo() before the actual ComparatorExpression is constructed.

Specified by:
setOrderInfo in interface ListDataProvider
Parameters:
orderInfo - the current ordering info.
